name: Stellar Pizza
description:
You play a pizza boy who's insane boss see's a way to profit off an invasion of fish monsters from outer space.  Race around killing fish monsters with tomato based weaponry.   Find their leader and take him out to finish the game.

WASD to move
Space to shoot
E to interact with things
Esc to pause/unpause

For a behind the scenes peek.

https://doublewickstudio.com/index.php/2020/01/31/notmoejam-9-submission-and-upd...

TLDR -

We set out to make a ridiculous narrative game, but we ran out of time without finishing it so we spent around 14 hours over 2 days converting it into an action game so we had something to submit.
